lead_paragraph: The Canadiens enforcer Georges Laraque is one of a handful of N.H.L. players of Haitian descent and has family members missing in the earthquake’s aftermath.
snippet: The Canadiens enforcer Georges Laraque is one of a handful of N.H.L. players of Haitian descent and has family members missing in the earthquake’s aftermath.
